==Trivia==
* The English title may be a reference to the Disney character {{w|Ariel_(The_Little_Mermaid)|Ariel}} from ''{{w|The_Little_Mermaid_(1989_film)|The Little Mermaid}}'' (1989). There are no references to the name "Ariel" in ''Genshin Impact'' at the time of the soundtrack's release.
